channel.title: Setting up two servers
channel.description: ok i have two comps in my house i have one server set up on one ppl can log in but when i set up a server on the other comp for my bro when i log in through no-ip it logs into my server lol. i have linkskys router and i have port forwarded but i couldnt help but see that on the main page of that linkys router thing it said domain name if and it was my server so i dont whant to change that if there is no way then he just wont have a server

item.title: Setting up two servers
item.dc:creator: @mrtube mrtube
item.description:
@mrtube wrote:

its not impossible you would just have 2 do 2 seperate portforwarding using diffrent ips

Read full topic
